faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to the questions you are curious about Schopi here.

questions.question: What is Schopi?
questions.answer: Schopi is a shopping list application. With Schopi, you can create, edit, and share your shopping lists.

questions.question: How can I purchase Schopi?
questions.answer: To purchase Schopi, download our app and create an account. Then, you can purchase Schopi using the in-app purchase option.

questions.question: What is the price of Schopi?
questions.answer: The price information of Schopi is available within the app. Download the app to see the prices and make a purchase.

questions.question: Is it difficult to set up Schopi?
questions.answer: No, setting up Schopi is quite easy. Download the app, create an account, and start creating your shopping lists.

questions.question: What payment methods are supported by Schopi?
questions.answer: Schopi accepts payments through Apple and you can pay with a credit card.

questions.question: Do you provide technical support for Schopi?
questions.answer: Yes, Schopi's technical support team is here to help you. If you have any questions, please contact us.

questions.question: Are updates for Schopi free?
questions.answer: Yes, updates for Schopi are free and we regularly release updates to keep the app up to date.
